templates.title: Mapping ND
templates.description: Mapping ND application with adminer. Using traefikv2 rProxy (should be preinstaled on your docker platform).
templates.name: Mapping ND

env.name: STACKNAME
env.label: Name of the stack
env.description: String with lowecase letters, digits and underscores. It must not contain spaces, dashes etc.

env.name: PHP_VERSION
env.label: PHP version
env.description: Version of the PHP used in the containers.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_LATEST_BUILD
env.label: Download latest build? (yes / no)
env.description: Download latest build and make update when init container starts. Should be yes for first start of the stack.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_URL
env.label: Download URL
env.description: URL where can be app build downloaded.

env.name: APP_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: ADMINER_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Adminer allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.
